(1) Сирийские повстанцы утром 8 августа: (1) Syrian rebels fired rockets at the convoy of President Bashar al-Assad on the morning of August 8. (2) According to the Al-Arabiya TV channel, the head of state was not injured as a result of the incident. (3) Assad's cortege was fired upon on its way to a mosque in central Damascus. (4) As Reuters clarifies with reference to the leadership of the rebels, several missiles were fired at the motorcade. (5) Some of them reached their goal, but there is no exact information about the number of damaged vehicles and the number of victims. (6) Assad himself managed to get to the mosque, where a sermon is being held in honor of the holiday of Eid al-Adha, which marks the end of fasting for Muslims in the holy month of Ramadan. (7) The sermon is broadcast on state television. (8) The agency notes that, judging by the broadcast, the president was not injured. (9) Earlier, the rebels stated that they blocked all roads to the residence of Assad and would not allow his motorcade to the mosque. (10) In turn, the Syrian Ministry of Information denied reports of the attack on the motorcade. (11) According to Agence France-Presse, the department said that Assad himself was driving, while he safely and without incident reached the mosque. (12) The confrontation between government forces and the rebels has been going on for over two years. (13) It began in the spring of 2011 with massive protests against the Assad regime and soon escalated into a full-scale civil war. (14) The human rights activists estimate the number of victims of the conflict at more than one hundred thousand people. (15) In addition, one and a half million people had to leave the country.
\"(1) Московский футбольный клуб \"Спарт: "(1) Moscow football club" Spartak "will buy the goalkeeper of Kazan" Rubin "Sergei Ryzhikov for ten million euros, reports" Soviet Sport. "(2) The transition will take place by the end of August, and it will be officially announced when Rubin finds a new goalkeeper. (3) Who can replace Ryzhikov is still unknown. (4) At the end of July Ryzhikov signed a new contract with Rubin until December 31, 2012. (5) The agreement contains a clause on a fixed amount of compensation for which the goalkeeper may move to another club. (6) This point was used by Spartak, offering ten million euros for the goalkeeper. (7) In addition, Ryzhikov himself wants to move to Spartak. (8) Information that the Moscow club is interested Rubin's goalkeeper, appeared in the Russian media even before Ryzhikov renewed his contract. (9) In July, newspapers wrote that Spartak offered six million euros for the 29-year-old goalkeeper. (10) Earlier in the summer off-season, Rubin parted ways with striker Alexander Bukharov and midfielder m Sergei Semak (both moved to Zenit). (11) At the beginning of the 2010 season, Soslan Dzhanaev was the main goalkeeper of Spartak. (12) However, in July, after several unsuccessful matches, Sergey Pesyakov took his place. (13) In addition, Spartak has Croat Stipe Pletikosa, but he is likely to leave the team in the near future. (14) Perhaps he will be loaned to Tottenham, England. "
(1) Через полчаса, стесняясь и досадуя н: (1) Half an hour later, embarrassed and annoyed with himself, Romashov knocks on the Nikolaevs. (2) Vladimir Efimich Nikolaev is busy. (3) For two years in a row, he has been failing his academy exams. (4) You can apply only three times, and his wife Alexandra Petrovna, Shurochka, does everything so that the last chance is not wasted. (5) Helping her husband to get ready, Shurochka has already mastered the whole program, only ballistics is not given to her, Volodya is progressing very slowly. (6) Shurochka wants her husband to pass the exams and take her away from this wilderness. (7) "Am I really so uninteresting as a man and ugly as a woman, so that I can sour all my life in this slum, in this disgusting place, which is not on any geographical map!" (8) With Romochka (as she calls Romashov) Shurochka discusses a newspaper article about fights recently allowed in the army. (9) She considers them necessary, otherwise they will not breed among the officer's environment a sharpie or drunkard like Nazansky. (10) Romashov does not want to enroll Nazansky in this company, who believes that the ability to love, like talent, is not given to everyone. (11) Once Shurochka rejected this man, and her husband hates the lieutenant. (12) This time Romashov sits with the Nikolaevs until it's time to sleep. (13) At home, another note awaits him from Peterson, in which she threatens Romashov with cruel revenge for his neglect of her. (14) A woman knows where Romashov is every day and who he is passionate about.
(1) Спикер парламента Новороссии Олег Ца: (1) Speaker of the Parliament of Novorossiya Oleg Tsarev in an interview with the Kommersant newspaper spoke about how the parliamentary elections in the DPR and LPR will be held. (2) According to Tsarev, the elections will be held according to a proportional system, and registered public associations will be able to nominate their lists. (3) “100 deputies will be in the Donetsk parliament, 50 in the Luhansk parliament, 60 in the parliament of Novorossia - 30 each from the republic. (4) Elections to the parliaments of the DPR and LPR will be direct, and then they will form the parliament of Novorossia, ”added the deputy of the Verkhovna Rada. (5) At the same time, he found it difficult to say how many residents of Donbass will be able to take part in the voting. (6) “It is difficult to count potential voters: in a year, 4.3 million Ukrainians crossed the border with Russia, 3 million returned, about 1 million remain in Russia, a significant part of them are refugees from Novorossia. (7) There was no census in the republics, more than half of the population left Donetsk. (8) The number of inhabitants can be estimated only by the consumption of bread and electricity, ”Tsarev said. (9) “The elections are a new step in legitimizing the independent status of Novorossiya. (10) The first step was a referendum. (11) The second is elections. (12) The third will be their recognition, ”Tsarev summed up. (13) Elections to the parliaments of the DPR and LPR are to be held on November 2. (14) A few days before this, elections to the Verkhovna Rada will take place, which the representatives of the people's republics of Donbass decided to ignore. (15) Donetsk people's republic and Luhansk people's republic were formed in the spring of 2014 by supporters of the secession of Donbass.
\"(1) Президент ФРГ Кристиан Вульф заяви: "(1) President of the Federal Republic of Germany Christian Wulff said that Germany was faced with the task of a new unification. (2) According to AFP, with these words the president addressed those gathered at the ceremony in Bremen on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the unification of the country. (3)" Christianity is definitely part of Germany. (4) Judaism is definitely part of Germany. (5) This is our Judeo-Christian story. (6) But today Islam has also become part of Germany, "Wolff said. (7) At the same time, he demanded that all citizens of the country comply with its constitution and follow the German way of life. (8) Speaking about the unification of the country in 1990, Wolff said , which “bows his head to those who fought for freedom.” (9) According to DW-WORLD, the president noted that the people of East Germany had to overcome the greatest difficulties associated with unification. (10) On the eve of the celebrations in Bremen, with a statement on the occasion German Chancellor Angela Merkel made a speech on the 20th anniversary of the unification. (11) She stressed that it was only thanks to the joint efforts of East and West Germans that Germany became a country respected throughout the world. (12) Many world leaders sent congratulations on the anniversary to Berlin. ( 13) Russian President Dmitry Medvedev noted Moscow's key contribution to the unification process. (14) US President Barack Obama called the peaceful unification of the FRG and the GDR a historic achievement. "
(1) «Я уже слышу твоё возражение, что сч: (1) “I can already hear your objection that happiness is not only in loving, but also in being loved. (2) But whoever really loves does not expect and does not beg: what will my love bring me? .. (3) Will reciprocity await me? (4) Or maybe I love more and love me less? (5) The person who measures and weighs does not love. (6) Let your love go free, let its rays shine and warm in all directions. (7) And you will soon feel that streams of reciprocal love are flowing to you from everywhere. (8) Why? (9) Because your immediate, unintentional kindness, your selfless love, will invisibly evoke kindness and love in people in return. (10) And then you will perceive this return flow not as a painful happiness, which had to be demanded and achieved, but as undeserved earthly bliss. " (11) I finished reading my mother's letter with tears in my eyes. (12) From the distance of the past years, I again heard her warm voice, which brought me love and consolation, as "undeserved earthly bliss." (13) And then I thought that our love is a thread with which we are attached to a loved one. (1) He who loves, his heart blooms and smells sweet, and he gives his love as a flower scent. (15) Such a person does not feel lonely. (According to I.A.Ilyin)
(1) К этому времени автор повествования: (1) By this time, the author of the story is already familiar with Marusya Tatarovich. (2) She lives in an empty rented apartment, almost always without money. (3) One day Marusya calls the author and asks to come, complaining that she was beaten up by a new admirer, Latin American Raphael, Rafa. (4) They began to live a strange and stormy life: Rafa either disappeared or reappeared, where he took money from, it was not clear, because all his enrichment projects were pure nonsense. (5) Maroussia considered him a complete fool, with only a bed on his mind. (6) True, he adored her son Levushka, with whom he felt on equal terms. (7) When the author comes to Marusa, he finds her with a black eye and a split lip. (8) Marusia complains about her boyfriend, soon he himself comes - all bandaged, smelling of iodine. (9) The circumstances of the quarrel are clearly apparent: Rafa defended himself from the angry Marusya. (10) Evoking, if not pity, then sympathy, he looks at Marusya with devoted and shining eyes. (11) Over a bottle of rum, in the presence of the author and on his advice, Marusia and Rafa reconcile.
(1) Зверолов уходит из дома, чтобы умере: (1) The hunter leaves home to die alone. (2) After the death of his grandfather, the grandson finds a carefully preserved old coin and a photo of a beautiful girl with a canary. (3) Boy Ilya grows up as a lonely, withdrawn orphan. (4) His mother, like Kablukov, is afflicted with the disease of vagrancy. (5) He is brought up by an oppressive grandmother, hiding the secret of his birth from the grandson. (6) Growing up, Ilya works as a journalist for a newspaper. (7) At the Medeo skating rink, he meets the beautiful musician Gulya, the young people get married. (8) Etinger's House, Odessa, early 20th century. (9) The Etinger family lives in a large apartment: father Gabril (Herzl) is a famous clarinet player and tenor, his wife Dora and children Yasha and Esther (Esya), servant Stesha is the same age as his daughter. (10) The family is rich and musical, children learn music and even give concerts. (11) In the summer at the dacha, father and son sing a duet, delighting the audience. (12) Suddenly, the teenager Yasha is infected with revolutionary ideas and gives up music. (13) After an unsuccessful parental attempt to suppress this passion, he runs away from home, taking a family heirloom - the platinum coin of the soldier grandfather.
(1) В Санкт-Петербурге направлено в суд: (1) In St. Petersburg, the case of policeman Denis Gribkov, who is accused of pedophilia, was sent to court. (2) This was reported on February 2 on the website of the St. Petersburg Department of the Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation. (3) According to the investigation, in 2006-2008, Gribkov committed three times violent acts of a sexual nature against 11-15-year-old boys and three more times unsuccessfully attempted such actions. (4) Gribkov attacked children in various districts of St. Petersburg, as well as in the metro. (5) However, he was wearing a police uniform. (6) In 2008, Gribkov and his colleague Yuri Korotkov were detained on suspicion of murdering the detainee. (7) Policemen shot one of the participants in the mass brawl in the head. (8) In the course of the investigation of the incident, it turned out that in the past these policemen had beaten the detainees more than once. (9) In August 2009, Korotkov was sentenced to five years in prison, and Gribkov to 3.5 years. (10) However, the prosecution appealed this sentence as too lenient, and in November the case was sent for a new trial. (11) Gribkov was suspected of pedophilia shortly after the start of an investigation into the murder and beatings. (12) The investigators drew attention to the fact that after the arrest of Gribkov, the St. Petersburg police stopped receiving applications from teenagers who suffered from the actions of a maniac in police uniform. (13) So the detainee became a defendant in the second criminal case.
(1) Голливудские знаменитости обратились: (1) Hollywood celebrities have reached out to the public to support the comatose daughter of singer Whitney Houston, the Associated Press reports. (2) Through their social media accounts, the stars urged subscribers to pray for Bobbi Kristina Brown, who was hospitalized on January 30 in Georgia, USA. (3) “Let's send rays of love and our prayers to Bobby Christine Brown! (4) Full and quick recovery for her! " - Singer La Toya Jackson wrote on Twitter. (5) Rap singer Missy Elliott also supported the girl in her microblog. (6) “Pray for Bobby Christina,” she said. (7) Doctors decided to put Bobby Christina Brown into a medically induced coma after the girl developed cerebral edema. (8) The girl was found unconscious in the bathroom of her home in the vicinity of Atlanta by her husband Nick Gordon and a family friend. (9) They carried out resuscitation measures on their own before the arrival of doctors. (10) Bobby Christine Brown is 21 years old. (11) She is the daughter of black musician Bobby Brown and singer Whitney Houston. (12) From media reports, it is known that the girl suffered the death of her mother very hard. (13) Relatives feared that she might repeat her fate. (14) Bobby Christina is the sole heiress of Houston's $ 20 million fortune. (15) Singer and actress Whitney Houston died in a Beverly Hills hotel room on February 11, 2012. (16) Her body was also found in the bathroom by a relative; resuscitation did not give results. (17) The officially established cause of death is drowning.
(1) Когда дело кончено, один из налётчик: (1) When the matter is over, one of the hijackers throws off his cape, it is Caballero the Fraud, who pays off the stolen items at hand. (2) The chorus describes the hard artisanal work of Murieta. (3) Joaquin dreams of getting a lot of gold and returning home to distribute it to the poor. (4) But again on the stage is a group of Balakhons, plotting to unleash terror against foreigners. (5) The white race is above all! (6) The blond greyhounds from California, as they call themselves, launch attacks on mining villages. (7) In one of these raids, the thugs, including Caballero the Fraud, break into Murieta's house, rape and kill Teresa. (8) Returning from the mine, Joaquin swears over his wife's lifeless body to avenge her and punish the murderers. (9) From this day on, Joaquin becomes a robber. (10) Murieta, riding on a horse of vengeance, keeps the whole neighborhood in fear, commits reprisals against the white gringos who commit lawlessness and profit from crimes. (11) Reyes and Three-Fingered, like some other Chileans, decide to join the formidable robber, to retaliate for the shed blood of the brothers. (12) A squad of avengers gathers around Joaquin.
(1) Звонил Зильберович по поручению Сим: (1) Zilberovich called on behalf of Sim Simich Karnavalov. (2) At one time, it was Leo who discovered Karnavalov as a writer. (3) Sim Simich, a former convict, then worked as a stoker in a kindergarten, led an ascetic lifestyle and wrote from morning to night. (4) He conceived the fundamental essay "The Big Zone" in sixty volumes, which the author himself called "lumps". (5) Soon after Karnavalov was "discovered" in Moscow, he began to publish abroad and instantly gained fame. (6) All Soviet power - the police, the KGB, the Writers' Union - entered into a struggle with him. (7) But they could not arrest him, and they could not expel him: remembering the story with Solzhenitsyn, Karnavalov appealed to the whole world with a request not to accept him if the “swallowers” ​​(as he called the communists) pushed him out by force. (8) Then the authorities had no choice but to simply push him out of the plane that flew over Holland. (9) In the end, Sim Simich settled in Canada on his own estate, called Otradnoye, where everything was arranged in a Russian way: they ate cabbage soup, porridge, women wore sarafans and scarves. (10) The owner himself memorized Dahl's vocabulary at night, and in the morning he rehearsed the ceremonial entry to Moscow on a white horse. (11) Karnavalov instructed Kartsev to take to Moscow thirty-six ready-made “blocks” of the “Big Zone” and a letter to “Future rulers of Russia”.
(1) Изжелта-серый, сверху рыхлый, исподн: (1) Izzhelta-gray, loose on top, hard, coarse sand underneath ... sand without end, wherever you look! (2) And over this sandy desert, over this sea of ​​dead ashes, rises the huge head of the Egyptian sphinx. (3) What do these large, protruding lips, these immobile-wide, upturned nostrils mean - and these eyes, these long, half-sleepy, half-alert eyes under the double arch of high eyebrows? (4) And they want to say something! (5) They even speak - but Oedipus alone can solve the riddle and understand their silent speech. (6) Bah! Yes, I recognize these features ... (7) There is already nothing Egyptian in them. (8) A white low forehead, prominent cheekbones, a short and straight nose, a beautiful white-toothed mouth, a soft mustache and a curly goatee - and these wide-set small eyes ... and on the head a cap of hair parted ... (9) Yes, it's you, Karp, Sidor, Semyon, Yaroslavl, Ryazan peasant, my compatriot, Russian bone! (10) How long ago did you get into the sphinxes? (11) Or do you want to say something too? (12) Yes, and you are also a sphinx. (13) And your eyes - these colorless, but deep eyes also speak ... (14) And their speech is just as silent and mysterious. (15) But where is your Oedipus? (16) Alas! it is not enough to put on a murmol to become your Oedipus, O All-Russian Sphinx!
\"(1) Бывший президент СССР Михаил Горба: "(1) Former President of the USSR Mikhail Gorbachev announced his readiness to lead the League of Voters, Interfax reports. (2)" Yes, I would agree to lead the League of Voters, "the agency quoted Gorbachev as saying in response to a relevant question during a lecture at the International University in Moscow. (3) The "League of Voters" appeared after massive civil protests against falsification of the results of elections to the State Duma. (4) It was created on the initiative of Leonid Parfyonov and Boris Akunin in January 2012. ( 5) It is positioned as a general civil movement for fair elections and fair relations between the state and citizens and does not plan to become a political party. (6) In particular, members of the "League of Voters" hope to receive mandates from presidential candidates to observe elections. (7) The "League" has no formal leader, and among the 16 founders of the movement are public figures, journalists and TV presenters. (8) Gorbachev is not among them. (9) Former President The nt of the USSR, at a lecture at the International University, also said that, in his opinion, Vladimir Putin had done a lot of useful things, but now he had "exhausted himself." (10) "Most likely, Putin will go out to the president. (11) But if he cannot change himself, otherwise he will lead the case, then everyone will take to the square. (12) This must not be allowed. (13) We will go to the square if after the presidential election the situation will not change, "Gorbachev said. (14) Gorbachev in December 2011 already called on Putin to leave politics, and in January 2012 he proposed to hold a referendum to abolish the "autocracy."
(1) Дон Кихот решил спуститься в пещеру: (1) Don Quixote decided to go down to the cave of Montesinos. (2) Sancho and the student guide tied a rope around him and he began to descend. (3) When all one hundred braces of the rope were unwound, they waited for half an hour and began to pull the rope, which turned out to be so easy, as if there was no load on it, and only the last twenty braces were difficult to pull. (4) When they took out Don Quixote, his eyes were closed and with difficulty they managed to push him apart. (5) Don Quixote said that he saw many miracles in the cave, saw the heroes of the old romances of Montesinos and Durandart, as well as the enchanted Dulcinea, who even asked him for a loan of six reais. (6) This time his story seemed implausible even to Sancho, who knew very well what kind of magician had bewitched Dulcinea, but Don Quixote stood his ground. (7) When they reached the inn, which Don Quixote, contrary to his custom, did not consider a castle, Maese Pedro appeared there with the soothsayer monkey and the district committee. (8) The monkey recognized Don Quixote and Sancho Panza and told everything about them, and when the show began, Don Quixote, taking pity on the noble heroes, rushed with a sword at their pursuers and killed all the dolls. (9) True, then he generously paid Pedro for the destroyed paradise, so he was not offended. (10) In fact, it was Gines de Pasamonte, who was hiding from the authorities and engaged in the craft of a raionist - so he knew everything about Don Quixote and Sancho, usually, before entering the village, he asked in the vicinity about its inhabitants and for a small bribe "Guessed" the past.
\"(1) Госсекретарь США Джон Керри заявил: "(1) US Secretary of State John Kerry said he considers his current post to be the last in his political career. (2) He stated this in an interview with CNN. (3) When asked if he is going to run for president in 2016, Kerry replied that he had no such plans. (4) “This (the work of the Secretary of State - approx. Lenta.ru) is my final stop,” he said, stressing that, having fulfilled the current term, “he will move on.” ( 5) John Kerry has headed the US Department of State since 2013, when Hillary Clinton left this post. (6) Prior to that, he chaired the Senate Foreign Relations Committee since 2009. (7) In 2004, Kerry ran for the Democratic presidency. however, he lost to George W. Bush. (8) As Secretary of State, Kerry managed to secure the resumption of Palestinian-Israeli negotiations. (9) In addition, he met with his Iranian counterpart Mohammad Javad Zarif. (10) Talks between Iran and the United States at such a high level was not before that more six years old. (11) In addition, John Kerry has actively advocated the use of force to end the civil war in Syria. (12) The current negotiations on the situation in this country continue with the active participation of Washington. (13) Former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton and Vice President Joe Biden are named in the list of potential candidates for the presidency in 2016. "
\"(1) Режиссёр Даррен Аронофски заявил,: "(1) Director Darren Aronofsky stated that he conceived the films The Wrestler and The Black Swan as a single project, according to the Collider website, citing MTV. (2)" I once worked on a project centered on there was a romance between a ballerina and a wrestler. (3) And then this project split into two films, "- said Aronofsky. (4) He also stated that he sees a lot in common between wrestling matches and ballet. (5) From the director's point of view, both are art. (6) Aronofsky said he hoped viewers would also be able to find similarities between the films "The Wrestler" and "Black Swan", and a movie theater would show the films in double screening. (7) The drama "The Wrestler" was released in 2008. (8) The main role in the film was played by Mickey Rourke. (9) The film brought Aronofsky the "Golden Lion" - the main award of the Venice Film Festival. (10) "Black Swan" is Aronofsky's last directorial work to date. (11) This is a psychological thriller, telling about the conflict between two ballerinas. (12) Natalie Portman, Vincent Cassel, Mila Kunis and Winona Ryder are involved in the film. (13) The 67th Venice Film Festival will open with the screening on Wednesday, September 1. "
(1) 10 июня профессор Немур и доктор Штр: (1) On June 10, Professor Nemours and Dr. Strauss fly to a medical symposium in Chicago. (2) Charlie and the mouse Algernon will be the main "exhibits" at this major event. (3) On the plane, Charlie recalls how his mother tried in vain to cure him, to make him smarter. (4) She spent almost all of the family's savings that her father, a hairdressing equipment salesman, wanted to open his own hairdressing salon with. (5) Charlie's mother left Charlie alone, giving birth again and proving that she was able to have healthy children. (6) Charlie dreamed of becoming a normal person, so that his mother would finally love him. (7) "Every day I learn something new about myself, and the memories that began with a slight ripple overwhelm me with a ten-point storm." (8) At the symposium, Charlie discovers such a vast knowledge and intelligence that professors and academics pale in comparison. (9) This does not prevent Professor Nemur from calling him "his creation" equating Charlie with the mouse Algernon. (10) The professor is sure that before the operation Charlie was an "empty shell" and did not exist as a person. (11) Many consider Charlie to be arrogant and intolerant, but he simply cannot find his place in life. (12) Gordon feels like a test animal in a talk on the operation to enhance intelligence. (13) In protest, he releases Algernon from the cage, then finds him first and flies home.
(1) В придорожном кабачке Кмициц случайн: (1) In a roadside tavern, Kmitsits accidentally hears the Czech Vzheschovich, who is in the service of the enemy, declares that the Yasnogorsk monastery will soon be occupied and plundered by the Swedes. (2) Kmicice hurries to Czestochowa, falls prostrate before the miraculous icon - and his heart is filled with joy and hope. (3) He tells about the plans of the Swedes to the abbot of the monastery, priest of Kordetsky. (4) The Poles will not tolerate the desecration of the shrine, they will come to their senses and drive out the enemy! - exclaims this holy man. (5) He forgives Kmicitsa's sins, and happy Andrzej, having humbled his pride, heroically fights against the enemy who besieged the monastery. (6) The traitor Kuklinovsky, who appeared at the monastery for negotiations - an impudent tyrant, a bandit and a libertine - lures Kmititsa to the Swedes and receives a hard slap and a kick in the ass for this. (7) Soon Kmicitz, making a desperate sortie, detonates the most powerful Swedish cannon. (8) By this he saves the monastery, but he himself, stunned, falls into the hands of the enemy. (9) Kuklinovsky, burning with a thirst for revenge, tortures the prisoner with fire, but Andrzej is beaten off by Kemlichi. (10) Having finished off the traitor, Kmicits and the Kemlichs go to Silesia, to Jan Casimir.
(1) Главный тренер мюнхенской «Баварии»: (1) The head coach of Bayern Munich, Josep Guardiola, was involved in an accident, reports The Daily Mirror. (2) The accident occurred on Monday, March 2, but only now became known about it. (3) The team coach drove around Munich in an Audi RS6 company car. (4) At some point, the 44-year-old coach lost control and crashed into a car in front. (5) Guardiola himself and the other driver were not injured, and police soon arrived at the scene of the accident. (6) The Spanish coach, keeping a friendly tone, gave them the necessary explanations. (7) Also, eyewitnesses claim that Guardiola tried to resolve the conflict without police intervention, but this information has not yet been confirmed. (8) Guardiola has been coaching Bayern Munich since 2013. (9) Together with Munich, he won the German championship, the National Cup, the planetary club championship and the UEFA Super Cup 2013. (10) The Spaniard is also the most titled coach in the history of Catalan Barcelona. (11) In four years of his work, the blue garnet won 14 trophies, including two Champions League cups and three Spanish championships. (12) In 2009 and 2011, Josep was named the best club coach in the world.
\"(1) Жители Санкт-Петербурга обнаружили: "(1) Residents of St. Petersburg discovered in one of the courtyards on Nevsky Prospect a figure of a two-headed eagle from the fence of the Alexander Column, according to the official website of the Hermitage Museum. (2) The figure of an eagle was discovered on May 31 in the courtyard of house number 11 on Nevsky Prospect , which is known as the Bird Courtyard. (3) Roman Zaitsev and Osama Lubani recognized in the figure an element of the fence of the monument in front of the Hermitage and returned it to the museum. (4) An accidental passer-by brought Eagle to Nevsky Prospect, who decided that the figure would fit into the decoration of the courtyard (5) The Hermitage suggests that the figure of the eagle was stolen in the winter of 2007, when a skating rink was built on Palace Square. (6) The case with the return of details of the decoration of the fence of the monument on Palace Square was already the second. (7) During the restoration the found figures will be returned to their place. (8) The Alexander Column, also known as the Pillar of Alexandria, was erected on Palace Square in front of the Hermitage in 1834. (9) The column is fenced, designed by Auguste Montferrand. (10) The railing was originally decorated with 136 double-headed eagles. (8) 80 small eagles and two large ones were lost. (11) In 2003, the fence was recreated according to the original project. (12) Interfax notes that since the transfer of the Alexander Column to the Hermitage, four eagles have been stolen from the fence. (13) Currently, the museum notes, the fence is under 24-hour video surveillance, and cases of vandalism are suppressed. "
\"(1) Заместитель председателя комиссии: "(1) Deputy Chairman of the Commission for the Support of Family, Children and Motherhood of the Public Chamber of Russia, Pavel Sychev, in an interview with Lenta.ru, spoke in favor of limiting the speed limit on the highways after an accident with 12 dead in Yugra. (2)" It is necessary to introduce measures to speed limit. (3) Speed, recklessness. (4) We often have real "races" on public roads. (5) The nature of the damage (in an accident near Khanty-Mansiysk - approx. "Lenta.ru") clearly says that the collision of a truck and a bus happened at high speed, "Sychev said. (6) Earlier on December 5, it was reported that the head of the Russian IC, Alexander Bastrykin, was flying to the Khanty-Mansiysk Autonomous Okrug, where 12 people died, to coordinate the work on finding out the causes of the car accident. . (7) On Sunday, December 4, near Khanty-Mansiysk, a regular bus in which a children's sports team from Nefteyugansk was traveling home from the competition collided with a truck. (8) As a result of the accident, 12 passengers, including 11 children, died. (9) Another two dozen teenagers were injured. (10) The bus driver survived. (11) A criminal case has been initiated against him. (12) According to the investigation, he lost control and provoked a head-on collision. (13) Russian President Vladimir Putin expressed his condolences to the relatives of the victims. (14) December 5 is declared a day of mourning in the Khanty-Mansi Autonomous Okrug. "
(1) Неаполитанский клуб «Наполи» со счет: (1) Napoli Neapolitan club 3: 1 defeated Fiorentina Florentine and won the Italian Cup for the fifth time. (2) Striker Lorenzo Insigne scored two goals against Fiorentina. (3) The final match of the tournament was held in Rome, at the Olympic Stadium. (4) The start of the meeting was delayed by 45 minutes due to a conflict between the teams' fans. (5) The car of Napoli fans was fired at, injuring four people, including a policeman. (6) While waiting for the first referee's whistle, the fans threw fires onto the field. (7) The final goal in the Napoli - Fiorentina match From the very beginning of the match, Napoli went actively on the attack. (8) Already in the 11th minute, Insigne opened the scoring. (9) Six minutes later, the young striker hits the Florentine goal again. (10) Peruvian midfielder Juan Manuel Vargas helps Fiorentina close the gap. (11) Just before the whistle for the end of the first half, Fiorentina scores the second goal, but the referee indicates that it was offside. (12) In the second half of the meeting, the situation escalated even more, which led to a series of yellow cards and the removal from the field of Napoli captain Gokhan Inler. (13) The point in the match in the second added minute is put by the forward of the Neapolitan club Dries Mertens. (14) With a score of 3: 1, Napoli win the fifth cup in its history.
(1) Солнышко светило уже высоко, уж полд: (1) The sun was already high, noon was already approaching. (2) The hedgehog was in a hurry to his burrow, on his back he carried a whole bunch of porcini mushrooms. (3) Running past the vegetable garden, he saw that there were still rabbits. (4) They tried to snatch the carrots from each other's paws, and things were already going to fight. (5) - Stop fooling around, garden thieves! - the hedgehog shouted to them, - Just waste your time and energy! (6) Now all the mushrooms will be taken apart, you will be left with nothing! (7) But the rabbits again did not pay any attention to the hedgehog. (8) The hedgehog took the mushrooms to the hole, dined, rested, and gathered again for mushrooms. (9) Looking into the garden, he saw that there was a fight going on with might and main. (10) Rabbits rolled head over heels in the beds, taking carrots from each other. (11) The hedgehog said nothing, only waved his paw, and went his own way.
(1) Здесь, близ подножья Везувия, — вход: (1) Here, near the foot of Vesuvius, is the entrance to the kingdom of the dead, here the decrepit prophetess Sibyl awaits Aeneas. (2) Aeneas descends underground with a magical golden branch in his hands: as Odysseus asked the shadow of Tiresias about his future, so Aeneas wants to ask the shadow of his father Anchises about the future of his descendants. (3) He swims across the river Styx of Hades, because of which there is no return to people. (4) He sees a reminder of Troy - the shadow of a friend mutilated by the Greeks. (5) He sees a reminder of Carthage - Dido's shadow with a wound in his chest; he speaks: "Against your will, queen, I left the shore!" - but she is silent. (6) To his left is Tartarus, where sinners are tormented: the godless, parricides, perjurers, traitors. (7) To his right is the field of the Blessed, where his father Anchises is waiting. (8) In the middle is the river of oblivion Summer, and over it the whirlwind of souls who are destined to purify themselves and be born in it are circling. (9) Among these souls, Anchises points out to his son the heroes of the future Rome: Romulus, the founder of the city, and Augustus, its regenerator, and legislators, and tyrannical fighters, and everyone who will establish the power of Rome over the whole world. (10) Each nation has its own gift and duty: the Greeks - thought and beauty, the Romans - justice and order: “Let others forge better the soulful copper, / I believe; let the living images of marble be harvested, / They will speak more beautifully in the courts, the movements of the sky / They will determine the movements of the sky, name the rising stars; / Your duty, Roman, is to rule the peoples with sovereignty! (11) / These are your arts: to prescribe laws to the world, / To spare the overthrown and to overthrow the disobedient. "
\"(1) Казахский режиссёр Еркин Ракишев с: "(1) Kazakh director Erkin Rakishev will shoot the film" My Brother Borat ", which will give" a worthy response to the British actor and director Sasha Baron Cohen, "reports Kazakhstanskaya Pravda. (2) The plot of the film is based on an American named John, who, After seeing Borat, he decides to go to Kazakhstan to look at everything described in the film with his own eyes. (3) Arriving in the country, he is "very surprised, because everything here is not the same as in the film." (4) Therefore, he goes in search of the mentioned in the film of Brother Borat, who is being treated in a mental hospital, and his hometown, Kusek. (5) "We want to 'ride' the success of 'Borat'. (6) Taking advantage of the popularity of the film in the West, we will show on this wave the true Kazakhstan, not invented by Sasha Baron Cohen, on this wave, "the director promised. (7) He added that one Hollywood company has already become interested in the new film, the names of which he has yet to announce (8) Filming is scheduled to begin in autumn 2010, and the film will be released in spring 2011. (9) The main roles are played by young Almaty actors Anton Mitnov and Roman Khikalov. (10) The project is financed by the private film studio "Ashina Film" (11) It is noteworthy that Rakishev had already filmed his answer to "Borat" two years ago for only 30 thousand dollars, however, due to the poor quality of the material received, he decided not to release the picture. (12) The film "Borat" was released in 2006. . (13) With a budget of $ 18 million, this painting has grossed over 260 million worldwide. "
(1) После ухода матери Жака и его брата: (1) After the departure of Jacques' mother and his brother, Valentine appears in the room. (2.) She reminds him of their former love and insistently demands the restoration of the old relationship. (3) Gaston never twice wants to become a traitor to his own brother, he is not at all sure that he is Jacques and that he will remain in this house. (4) Then Valentina points him to irrefutable proof: Jacques has a small scar under his shoulder blade, which the doctors did not notice. (5) Valentina herself left this mark with a hat pin when she decided that he was cheating on her. (6) When she leaves, Gaston discovers this scar and weeps bitterly. (7) The next morning, the other four families, claiming to be related to Gaston, arrive at Reno's house. (7) Among them is a boy who came from England with his lawyer, Maitre Pickwick. (8) A boy, wandering around the house, accidentally enters Gaston's room. (9) He tells him that he is the supposed uncle of Gaston, that all his relatives and friends sank along with the ship "Neptunia" when he was still an infant. (10) After talking with the boy's lawyer, Gaston informs the duchess that he is the boy's wanted nephew, and leaves Reno's house forever, because he does not want to start a new life with the baggage of old sins and constantly be surrounded by countless relatives who, by their appearance, every minute will remind him of them.
(1) У Плавта его зовут пышным именем Пир: (1) Plautus calls him the splendid name of Pyrgopolinik, which means "Winner of the Tower". (2) He sits in front of his house and watches as the servants clean his armor - "so that it is brighter than the sun!" (3) With him - a hanger named Breadbite, the two of them count how many enemies Pyrgopolinik laid down in his campaigns: some in Scythia, some in Persia, only seven thousand, and all in one day! (4) And then even in India, he interrupted the elephant's arm with one left, that is, the leg, and then hitting only half-heartedly! (5) And in general, what a hero he is - and a hero, and a brave, and a handsome man, and how women love him! (6) In fact, he is a swindler, a coward and a lecher. (7) This is reported to the public by his slave named Palestrion. (8) Palestrion served in Athens with a young man, and he loved one girl. (9) When the young man was away, this very Pyrgopolinik deceived this girl and took her here, to the city of Ephesus. (10) Palestrion rushed to warn the master, but on the way he was seized by pirates and sold into slavery to the same Pyrgopolinica. (11) However, he still managed to send the message to the former owner; he came to Ephesus, settled next to the warrior with a kind old man and secretly sees his beloved. (12) Here is the house of a warrior on the stage, and here is the house of the old man, they are nearby, and between them the clever slave easily built a secret passage.
(1) Нет сомнения — человечество найдёт п: (1) There is no doubt that humanity will find ways leading to renewal, deepening and fostering of its culture. (2) But for this it must learn gratitude in order to build its spiritual life on it. (3) Modern mankind does not value what is given to him; does not see his natural and spiritual wealth; does not extract from his inner world what is in it. (4) It values ​​not internal strength of mind, but external power - technical and state. (5) It wants not to create, create and improve, but to own. (6) Dispose and enjoy. (7) And therefore it is always not enough for it and everything is not enough: it always counts its "losses" and grumbles. (8) It is possessed by greed and envy and knows nothing about gratitude. (9) And so each of us must first of all learn to be grateful. (10) As soon as we open our spiritual eye and take a closer look at life, we will see that every moment, as it were, tests us, whether we are ripe for gratitude and whether we know how to thank. (11) And the one who passes this test turns out to be a man of the future: he is called to create a new world and its culture, he already carries them in himself. (12) He is a creative person; and the one who does not withstand this test is possessed by spiritual blindness and envy, he carries in himself the decomposition of a perishing culture, he is a man of an obsolete past. (13) This is the criterion of spirituality, here is the law and measure, which few people think about, but by which it is necessary to distinguish people. (14) What is gratitude? (15) This is the answer of a living, loving heart to the benefit rendered to it. (16) It responds with love to love, joy to kindness, radiation to light and warmth, faithful service to the granted grace. (17) Gratitude does not need verbal expressions, and sometimes it is better for a person to experience and express it wordlessly. (18) Gratitude is not a simple recognition of someone else's good deed, for an embittered heart accompanies such a recognition with a feeling of resentment, humiliation, or even a thirst for revenge. (19) No, real gratitude is joy and love, and in the future - the need to respond with good to good. (20) And the future of humanity belongs precisely to grateful hearts. (According to I. Ilyin)
(1) Гесиона пригласила к себе Элли, её о: (1) Hesione invited Ellie, her father and Mangan to her place to upset her marriage, because she does not want the girl to marry an unloved person because of the money and gratitude she feels for him for once Mangan helped her father to avoid complete ruin. (2) In a conversation with Ellie, Hesiona finds out that the girl is in love with a certain Mark Darili, whom she met recently and who told her about his extraordinary adventures, which won her over. (3) During their conversation, Hector, Hesiona's husband, a handsome, well-preserved fifty-year-old man, walks into the room. (4) Ellie suddenly falls silent, turns pale and staggers. (5) This is the one who introduced himself to her as Mark Darnley. (6) Hesione kicks her husband out of the room to revive Ellie. (7) Coming to her senses, Ellie feels that in an instant all her girlish illusions burst, and along with them her heart broke. (8) At the request of Hesiona, Ellie tells her everything about Mangan, about how he once gave her father a large sum to prevent the bankruptcy of his enterprise. (9) When the company still went bankrupt, Mangan helped her father out of such a difficult situation by buying the entire production and giving him the place of manager. (10) Enter Captain SHATOVER and MANGEN. (11) The captain at first glance understands the nature of the relationship between Ellie and Mangan. (12) He discourages the latter from marrying because of the large age difference and adds that his daughter decided at all costs to upset their wedding.
\"(1) Президентский центр Бориса Ельцина: "(1) Boris Yeltsin's Presidential Center has installed round-the-clock security at the monument to the first President of the Russian Federation in Yekaterinburg. (2) Interfax reports this on October 5. (4) In addition, video surveillance cameras were installed at the monument. (5) Drozdov expressed his disappointment that no one took responsibility for damaging the monument with paint. (6) According to him, he can even respect Al- Kaedu "for not being afraid to confess to her crimes. (7)" At least they find strength in themselves. (8) This gives meaning to the gesture of vandals, "the executive director explained. (9) The monument to Yeltsin, unveiled in 2011, was doused with paint on the night of August 24, 2012. (10) In addition, the vandals knocked letters off the pedestal. ( 11) The paint was stamped, it stuck into the marble, although it was covered with a protective substance. (12) The sculpture was cleaned only by October, the Presidential Center spent 2.4 million rubles on this. (13) According to Drozdov, because of this it was necessary to cut the budget of some programs, although in general "in the scale of the fund's work, this amount is not murderous." Media reported the arrest of several suspects in the destruction of the monument, but this news was not developed. "
\"(1) Казанский \"Ак Барс\" выиграл у уф: "(1) Kazan" Ak Bars "beat Ufa" Salavat Yulaev "away in the first match of the semifinal series of the Gagarin Cup - the playoffs of the Kontinental Hockey League (KHL). (2) Kazan won 4: 3 and took the lead in series (1: 0). (3) This is reported by the official website of the KHL. (4) In the middle of the first period, “Ak Bars” scored two goals per minute - Nikita Alekseev and Dmitry Kazionov distinguished themselves. (5) “Salavat” reduced the gap in account thanks to Igor Grigorenko. (6) In the middle of the second period the score was leveled - the goal was scored by the player of the Ufa club Alexey Medvedev. (7) Soon Kazionov again brought his team forward, and in the third period Alexey Tereshchenko increased the advantage of “Ak Bars”. (8) Eight and a half minutes before the end of the game, Aleksandr Radulov scored the third goal against the goalkeeper of “Ak Bars” Petri Vehanen. (9) Shortly before the final siren, “Salavat Yulaev” changed the goalkeeper for the sixth field player, but the Ufa team failed to equalize. (10) ) In the last minutes of the match, the hockey player "Salavat" Patrick Toresen injured Ak Bars forward Alexei Morozov. (11) Morozov could not finish the meeting, and Toresen was sent off until the end of the game. (12) It is not yet known how serious the injury of the Ak Bars player is. (13) The second match of the Salavat - Ak Bars series will take place on April 3 in Ufa. (14) In another semifinal series, the Moscow Region HC MVD is leading, beating Lokomotiv Yaroslavl in the first match. (15) The second game of these teams will take place on the evening of April 2. "
(1) Министерство обороны России подписал: (1) The Russian Ministry of Defense signed a contract with the Kazan enterprise "Enix" for the supply of reconnaissance unmanned aerial vehicles "Eleron-3SV". (2) According to RIA Novosti, this was stated by the chief designer of Enix, Valery Pobezhimov. (3) According to him, the contract value was more than one hundred million rubles. (4) Under the terms of the agreement, the Kazan enterprise will have to supply the Russian military department with 17 complexes, each of which includes two Eleron-3SV drones. (5) The production and transfer of unmanned systems to the military will be completed by the end of 2014. (6) According to Pobezhimov, the cost of the Eleron-3SV drone is five times less than that of the Zastava devices (licensed version of the Bird Eye 400 drone of the Israeli company IAI). (7) Pobezhimov first spoke about the preparation of a contract for the supply of drones to the Russian military department at the MAKS-2013 air show in Zhukovsky near Moscow in August 2013. (8) At the same time, he noted that deliveries of the first devices could begin as early as the first quarter of 2014. (9) The maximum takeoff weight of the Eleron-3SV is 5.3 kilograms. (10) The vehicle can carry a payload weighing up to a kilogram. (11) The device is capable of speeds up to 130 kilometers per hour and rise to an altitude of four thousand meters. (12) The wingspan of the Eleron-3SV is 1.47 meters, and the length is 0.64 meters. (13) The device is designed according to a modular scheme, thanks to which a quick replacement of the payload is possible.
(1) С глазами, полными слёз, Иван глядел: (1) With eyes full of tears, Ivan looked into the snow under him: the end of his tale was approaching. (2) True, a good half of the Oblog was untouched, but in the boy's mind the boron ceased to exist simultaneously with the death of that mighty coniferous old woman who overshadowed Kalinov's roof. (3) Leaving her was unthinkable: in the first blizzard, upon falling, she would have crushed Kalinov's gatehouse like a rotten nut. (4) - Now sound a little, - Knyshev said in a dull voice. (5) - Dakos and me to warm up a bit! (6) Unexpectedly for everyone, he threw off his underwear and remained in a white shirt, belted with a Caucasian strap with a silver set. (7) A dozen hands extended the saws to him; he chose the ax from the nearest one, estimated the weight, approvingly, for trial, touched the blade with his fingernail, which rang like a string, and trampled the snow where it interfered - listened to the upper rustle of the forest and slowly, as on a scaffold, looked at his sacrifice. (8) She was incredibly good now, the old mother of Oblog, in her ancient beauty, straight as a ray, and without a single flaw; snow, like a pink dream, rested on her heavy branches. (9) While not yet in full force, Knyshev swung and, with a pull on himself, as if teasing, hit the very bottom, on the resinous flow at the butt, where, like veins, the roots ran up the trunk, and the boy Ivan almost gasped from surprise that the blood did not splash his hands. (10) - Here's how to get it, - said Zolotukhin instructively. (11) - Learn! (12) And although Knyshev acted without a break, everyone understood: he somewhat tightens up his pleasure, which ordinary people never forgave even to the real executioners. (13) - Come on ... - someone whispered stiflingly above Ivan's head. (14) A barely noticeable movement was born in the branches, something busily crunched below and a small tremor echoed in the top. (15) There is nothing slower and more agonizing on earth than the fall of a tree, under whose shade the vague dreams of childhood visited you! (16) Without waiting for the end, all shuddering, Ivan went to wander through the open space. (17) He returned when he passed the fit of despair. (18) After so many years, it is not clear where the quiet peasant youth got such rage from, but one thing should be admitted to understand everything further: a vocation from a young age leads a person through skillfully selected spectacles of life in order to educate in him the skill and will to realize his historical goals. (19) One can only guess what a miracle Ivan had a slingshot, who put a stone in his hand in the middle of winter. (20) Knyshev managed to release the first cloud of smoke when Ivanov's gift hit him on the cheek. (According to L.M. Leonov)
(1) В больницу приходит бывшая жена трет: (1) The ex-wife of the third physicist, Johann Wilhelm Möbius, who married the missionary Rosa and now wants to say goodbye to her first husband with her three sons, comes to the hospital, since she is leaving for the Mariana Islands with the missionary. (2) One of the sons tells his father that he wants to become a priest, the second a philosopher, and the third a physicist. (3) Möbius strongly opposes one of his sons becoming a physicist. (4) If he himself had not become a physicist, he would not have ended up in a madhouse. (5.) For King Solomon appears to him. (6) The boys want to play the flutes for their father. (7) At the very beginning of the game, Mobius jumps up and asks them not to play. (8) He turns the table over, sits down in it and begins to read the fantastic psalms of King Solomon, then chases the Rose family, which leaves frightened and crying, forever parting with Mobius. (9) Sister Monica, his nurse who has been caring for him for two years, sees that he is pretending to be insane. (10) She confesses her love for him and asks him to leave the insane asylum with her, since Fraulein von Tsang does not consider him dangerous. (11) Mobius also admits that he loves Monica more than life, but he cannot leave with her, he cannot betray King Solomon. (12) Monica does not give up, she insists. (13) Then Mobius strangles her with a curtain cord.
(1) Проходит ещё несколько месяцев. (2): (1) A few more months pass. (2) The sowing time is coming. (3) Nils Ebbesen is dissatisfied with the behavior of his son: he gives him a slap for his expressed desire to become a soldier. (4) "What will young Ebbe do when he conquers the whole earth?" The father asks his son. (5) It is better and more reliable to take land from the swamps, draining them. (6) Ebbesen is no less strict with his daughter Ruth, she too willingly accepts the courtship of Whitinghof. (7) Does she really want her sons to be engaged in the murder of people in the future? (8) In general, this spring everyone is unhappy with everyone: a premonition of trouble hangs in the air. (9) Frou Gertrude also reprimands her husband. (10) The Holsteins, in her opinion, have already completely taken over the country; they now act not only with rudeness: when necessary, they are not averse to joking and can be courteous. (11) The Danes have completely softened: Count Gerhard is exhausted by the disease, but even he, the living dead, inspires such fear in the Danes that his army conquers the country with threats and promises alone, Mrs Gertrude does not understand her husband's optimism when he frivolously tells her that “ with the singing of a lark, the peasants will take up the plow and the Holsteins will soon be gone. "
(1) Основатель Центра современного искус: (1) The founder of the Winzavod Center for Contemporary Art, Sofya Trotsenko, told gallery owner Marat Gelman that the letter about the eviction of his Cultural Alliance gallery would be withdrawn. (2) Gelman himself reported this to Lente.ru. (3) According to him, he does not yet have official papers that Alliance will be able to remain at Winzavod. (4) Earlier on September 6, Gelman published in his LiveJournal a letter from the owner of the premises of MVK Estate LLC, which said that the contract with the tenant was terminated and that the Cultural Alliance should move out by September 10. (5) In the evening of September 6, the gallery opens the photo exhibition “Urban Planning Counterrevolution. Moscow 2010–2013. New Losses ”, which was collected by the town protection movement“ Arhnadzor ”. (6) It is dedicated to 43 historic Moscow buildings that were destroyed or threatened with destruction under the mayor of Moscow Sergei Sobyanin. (7) Arkhnadzor reported that eight sites refused to host the exhibition. (8) According to Gelman, on September 3, the exhibition was supposed to open at the Museum of Architecture, but on the last day, the museum refused it. (9) The gallery owner, in his own words, decided to let her into his gallery in gratitude for the city protection activities, thanks to which many buildings were saved. (10) The Cultural Alliance opened at Winzavod in the fall of 2012. (11) Its purpose is to support cultural processes in the regions of Russia. (12) Previously, the previous gallery of Marat Guelman, who has been engaged in exhibition activities and the art market since 1990, was located in the same place.

\"(1) Глава думского комитета по информа: "(1) The head of the Duma committee on information policy, information technology and communications, Alexei Mitrofanov, said that no one is going to close YouTube in Russia. (4) No one is going to close these resources, "the agency reports the deputy's words. (5) He added that solutions on the Internet" will be creative. "(6) The night before, Mitrofanov announced on the air of the Russian News Service that he was going to concentrate his activities in the committee on the problems of the Internet and communications. (7) He noted that "some amendments will be made" and there will be no "endless movement, as now" in the Runet. (8) At the same time, he promised that Russia will not there will be a "Chinese version", noting that "the decisions will be so elegant that you will be surprised." (9) The Media Committee was created on September 28, 2012. (10) At the same time, the State Duma approved its composition and appointed Mitrofanov as chairman. \"(1) Блок Юлии Тимошенко готов вместе с: "(1) The Yulia Tymoshenko bloc is ready, together with the ruling Party of Regions, to dismiss the mayor of Kiev, Leonid Chernovetskiy.
